attributes.action: An authenticity check on people supporting petition for 2nd EU referendum.
attributes.background: There is serious doubt being raised that people signing the 2nd referendum petition are actually multiple signaturies by the same person, and of foreign nationals being supplied with a British post code to register.

rejection.details: We already have certain checks on signatures on petitions. We have removed 77,000 signatures from that petition, because they were found to be fraudulent. If you would like there to be specific additional checks, you could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like us to do.
